dmca.title: Italian Hand Soap Expert Claims Infringement[Blogger]
dmca.body:
1. "The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://jerrysamson.blogspot.com/2007/04/making-soap-with-milk.html

2. The blog where my copyrighted work is published on is http://www.goarticles.com/cgi-bin-showa.cgi?C=46806

date of submission can be found at

http://www.goarticles.com/cgi-bin-showa.cgi?C=59117

3. Private]@Italianhandmadesoap.com

4. "I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law

5. "I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

6. "[Private]"
